title: 09/02/21: "The module has expired, functionality is limited"
content: Your Emprez dashboard is currently displaying the following message: "The module has expired, functionality is limited".Â Don't panic, this doesn't affect your usual use of Emprez in any way! ğŸ‘This message is displayed because we are currently fine-tuning before the launch of Emprez BI: the new Emprez gem that will give you access to key performance indicators on your human resources.We will soon offer you the possibility to test it, but in the meantime, we suggest you discover its features by clicking here.Do not hesitate to send us a ticket if you have any questions about this new module, our team will be happy to answer them! ğŸ˜ƒHelpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
